job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-25T15:08:15.000Z", "description": "

Are you an experienced (5+ years) Machine Learning Engineer looking to join an innovative and dynamic team and the thought of enabling higher adoption of renewable energy and zero emission mobility globally gets you excited?  

 

Located in Salem, MA Titan Advanced Energy Solutions develops and tests industry-leading, ultrasound-based battery diagnostics systems for applications in electric vehicles, consumer electronics, stationary storage, and 2nd life market for re-purposing of used EV batteries. 

 

Titan\u2019s innovative strides have been recognized with numerous awards and funding from top clean energy programs and institutions, including Greentown Labs, the Massachusetts Clean Energy Center (MassCEC) and the Department of Energy. Growing and poised to continue on their positive momentum, this is an exciting time to join the Titan team!

 

The Machine Learning Engineer will work with our multi-disciplined, fast-pace team on a variety of interesting projects. We are looking for an independent thinker who is highly self-motivated, driven to achieve, goal and team-oriented, and passionate about clean technology. The ideal candidate will bring a passion for solving important problems with machine learning, deep learning approaches in ways that create data driven solutions leading to end products. Your bias to action combined with a learning mindset allows you to take calculated risks and unlock opportunities along the way. You will work with a diverse team on an array of cross-disciplinary projects centered around ultrasound time series signal data; you will be responsible for delivering ML-based solutions from problem framing, to prototyping, to production application.

A successful candidate for this role will have solid computer science, mathematic fundamentals, experience developing machine learning based models, deploying and maintaining such models, experience with software development and continuous integration continuous deployment.  

 

Duties and Responsibilities:  

\u00b7      Use machine learning techniques to develop scalable prediction models on time series data

\u00b7      Explore deep learning approaches to develop scalable prediction models on time series data

\u00b7      Develop production grade pipeline to deploy machine learning models

\u00b7      Support on-going maintenance, updates on models deployed

\u00b7      Design data infrastructure to gather, store and facilitate analysis of large quantity data

\u00b7      Drive engineering best practices across the data team, including code reviews, testing, reproducibility

\u00b7      Generate and maintain documentation as required

\u00b7      Other duties as assigned 

 

Required skills: 

\u00b7      3+ years industry experience in machine learning, deep learning based modeling

\u00b7      BS, MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent degree

\u00b7      Expert proficiency with Python and related libraries  

\u00b7      Ideally experience with deep learning frameworks such as PyTorch and Tensorflow

\u00b7      Git, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD Pipelines 

\u00b7      Experience with relational/non-relational databases such as CouchDB

\u00b7      Experience with Docker (docker-compose and swarm) and optionally Kubernetes 

\u00b7      Excellent understanding of algorithms, data structures, coding standards

\u00b7      Self-motivated and pro-active, with multi-tasking and critical thinking capabilities

 

Preferred skills: 

\u00b7      Passion for clean energy, a systems-thinking perspective and a desire to take an active part in shaping a new paradigm 

\u00b7      Good knowledge of AWS Cloud Storage, Elastic Compute

\u00b7      Experience with Linux and shell scripting 

\u00b7      Previous working experience with ultrasound signal data

\u00b7      Foundational knowledge on signal processing

\u00b7      Start-up experience a plus

 

Personal Values: 

\u00b7      Bias to action, self-motivated and entrepreneurial spirit

\u00b7      Attention to detail, effective time management, and pride in work

\u00b7      Dependable, trustworthy, empathetic & full of integrity

\u00b7      Strong collaborative communication skills; able to build consensus internally and externally

 

Learn more at www.titanaes.com

 

Titan welcomes applicants from every background \u2013 our diversity helps us thrive and serve our customers and each other. All employment decisions are based on qualifications, merit and business needs, without discrimination or bias. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. If you need assistance or accommodation due to a disability, please let us know.
